text: wql -ayha alnby- lhwla' almtkhllifyn ean aljhad: aemaluu lilah bima yrdyh min taeth, wa'ada' fraydh, wajtnab almeasy, fasayaraa allah eamalakum warasuluh walmwmnwn, wsytbyn amrkm, wstrjewn yawm alqiamat 'iilaa man yaelam sirakum wjhrkm, fykhbrkm bima kuntum temlwn. wafi hdha tahdid wweyd liman aistamara ealaa batlh wtghyanh
